greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = -2; a(n) = n - a(n-1) for n > 0.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==-2,a[n]==n-a[n-1]},a,{n,80}] (* or *) With[ {nn=40}, Riffle[ Range[-2,nn-2],Range[3,nn+3]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 02 2019 *)
results.author: _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 14 2008
ext: Definition corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 11 2009
Formula adapted to offset by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 14 2009
